quest.name: Back in the Water
journal: Sisipu of the Fishermen's Guild wants to order a new fishing boat.

Keen to take to the seas once more, Sisipu expresses her desire to have a new fishing boat built. She bids you consult with Forgemaster H'naanza of the Armorers' Guild in her stead regarding how long the commission might take.

H'naanza regretfully informs you that Naldiq & Vymelli's is presently occupied with a large commission. Nonetheless, the forgemaster promises to do what she can in honor of the long-standing relationship between their two guilds.
objectives: Speak with H'naanza at the Armorers' Guild.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: The Calamity really knocked the wind out the fishing industry's sails, but fisherfolk are starting to return to the seas once more. It's past time I did the same.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: But before I can put out to sea again, I need to have a new boat built. Our guild has always commissioned Naldiq & Vymelli's for its crafts, but they are beastly busy these days.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: If you want for something to do, mayhap you could run over to the Armorers' Guild and consult with Forgemaster H'naanza in my stead. I would know how long we might expect to have to wait.

dialogue.name: HNAANZA
dialogue.text: A new boat for the Fishermen's Guild? I'm afraid now isn't the best time...

dialogue.name: HNAANZA
dialogue.text: You see, we have recently taken on a commission for a galleon. This task alone has all our hands full.

dialogue.name: HNAANZA
dialogue.text: But look, I will see what I can do. The Fishermen's Guild has long been one of our best clients, and I would be loath to disappoint Sisipu. It may yet take a while, but I shall endeavor to have her boat ready in a timely fashion.
